name: specswarm
description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.3.3: SAFETY - Enhanced intent disambiguation, mandatory 'ship it' confirmation, explicit negative conditions. v3.3.2: Simplified Skills. v3.3.1: Natural language via Skills. v3.3.0: Natural language commands. v3.2.0: Multi-language support. Core: 4 high-level commands, 70% simplification, full backward compatibility.
